sect2.title: iIn
sect2.para: in is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. The in operator is a binary operator that checks a column to see if a particular value is in that column. If the value is in the column, then the operator returns true, if it is not in the column, then the operator returns false.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Employee where ID in (Manager over {Manager_ID});
